job.title: Software Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description: Do you want to work for an Emmy Awardwinning company At Audible Magic we are building the most revolutionary media recognition technology and rights management solutions for the global music movie and television industry Our customers and partners include some of the largest and most recognized brands in the industry We win awards because we keep driving to provide better solutions for our customers solutions that meet the needs of the everchanging music and entertainment industry At Audible Magic we believe our customers are paramount and our reputation and integrity are the foundation of our businessbrbrWe are seeking a Software Engineer to join our team developing and supporting an existing Music Streaming Platform The successful candidate will join a small team of engineers supporting and extending this profitable and growing product linebrbrstronguResponsibilitiesbrustrongul liMaintain and extend code base for delivering music streams and downloads to enterprise customersli liDevelop new features for Music Streaming Serviceli liPartner with Product Management and Engineering Leadership to design new features and review technical architecture and specificationsli liWork with broader Engineering team on technology upgrades for the Music Streaming Serviceli liPartner with other Engineering Teams to fulfill product development and customer deliverablesli liClearly communicate status and open issues to team leads and managersli liCreate and maintain product documentation and developer docsli brbrulstronguRequirementsbrbrustrongSolid basic Java skills We use some Spring but mostly for dependency injectionbrul li Solid RDBMSSQL skillsli li Solid Oracle and PLSQL experienceli li SQL ServerTransact SQL knowledgeli li CNET and JavaScript skillsli li Good knowledge of web services both SOAP and RESTli li Proficiency with XML and related concepts and technologiesli li Proficiency with shell scriptingli brulstrongNice to havebrstrongul li Familiarity with WildFly formerly JBoss Java application serverli li Familiarity with Tomcat web containerli li Familiarity with Apache HTTP serverli li Knowledge of Perl programming languageli li Familiarity with Lucene text indexing frameworkli li Knowledge of Postgres DBSli li Knowledge of Apache CXF web services frameworkli li Experience with DW design and concepts li li Basic
